page.title: 03Family Life - Sunday.
page.content: One Sunday in a month our family go to church.We can only go once a month because our church is a Morman church in Lancaster.We have no transport of our own and a friend transports us to church.There are no buses to Glasson Dock on a Sunday. We are mother,father and five children in our family. When we come back from church we all have a sandwich.Sometimes my father takes me and my brother for a walk by the shore or on the canal. We watch television in the afternoon. At about five o clock we have a hot meal. My mother makes the meal.My mother does most of the work. On Sunday nights the children all have a bath.Dad uses the scrubbing brush to get us clean. We then have to go to bed at about half past seven.I say my prayers knelt by my bedside. I enjoy my Sunday.
